command.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @$lockedDate nvarchar(512), @bp_ref varchar(511), @min_ky_ngay_den smalldatetime select @$lockedDate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày giới hạn hoặc ngày khóa sổ.' else N'Data is locked, you must modify system locked date.' end select @key = '' if @@admin = 0 exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @@userID, @@admin, 'a', 'a', '@@sysDatabaseName', @key output, '', '' if @bo_phan <> '' select @key = @key + case when @key = '' then '' else ' and ' end + dbo.AI_ERP$Function$HRM$GetDeptRightKey(@bo_phan)
-- select top 0 a.ma_bp, b.bp_ref, cast(0 as int) as ky, cast(0 as int) as nam, a.ngay_tu as ky_ngay_tu, a.ngay_den as ky_ngay_den, a.so_ngay into #deptLocking from hrky a join hrbp b on a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp insert into #deptLocking(ma_bp, bp_ref, ky, nam, ky_ngay_tu, ky_ngay_den, so_ngay) exec AI_ERP$HRM$GetPeriod$Department @ky, @nam, @ky, @nam, '', @key, 'a', @@userID, @@admin, '@@sysDatabaseName' select @min_ky_ngay_den = min(ky_ngay_den) from #deptLocking
-- select top 0 ma_bp, bp_ref into #bp from hrbp select top 0 a.loai, a.ma_bp, a.ngay_ks, b.bp_ref into #hrbpks from hrbpks a, hrbp b
select a.*, b.bp_ref into #dmbpks from hrbpks a with(nolock) join hrbp b with(nolock) on a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp where a.loai = 2
set @q = 'insert into #bp select a.ma_bp, a.bp_ref from hrbp a with(nolock) where a.status = 1 ' + case when @key <> '' then ' and ' + @key else '' end exec sp_executesql @q insert into #hrbpks select 2, ma_bp, null, bp_ref from #bp
select a.ma_bp, min(b.ngay_ks) ngay_ks, min(b.bp_ref) bp_ref into #bp0 from #bp a cross join #dmbpks b where a.bp_ref like rtrim(b.bp_ref) + '%' group by a.ma_bp -- update #bp0 set bp_ref = b.bp_ref from #bp0 a left join hrbp b on a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp update #hrbpks set ngay_ks = b.ngay_ks from #hrbpks a join #dmbpks b on a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp update #hrbpks set ngay_ks = b.ngay_ks from #hrbpks a join #bp0 b on a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp and a.bp_ref = b.bp_ref where a.ngay_ks is null
if exists(select 1 from dmstt where ngay_ks >= @min_ky_ngay_den) begin select 'ky' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end
if exists(select 1 from #hrbpks a join #deptLocking b on a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp where a.ngay_ks >= b.ky_ngay_den) begin select 'ky' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end
-- drop table #bp drop table #bp0 drop table #hrbpks drop table #dmbpks drop table #deptLocking
exec hs_CalculatePayroll @ky, @nam, @bo_phan, @ma_nv, @@userID, @@admin, '@@sysDatabaseName', 0, 0
